This move was made in order to push the queen backwards and set her in front of the king.
moves.11. Be3: Now is the time to try and set a trap - capture and lock the queen.
moves.11... c5 12. Rc1: The rock will wait there until the moment is true...
moves.12... c4: Run away with the bishop? or leave a honey trap... which in the future can lead to the downfall of the queen...
moves.13. Bf4 Bh5 14. b3 cxd3: This was an obvious mistake... now the queen is gone
moves.15. cxd3 Nc5 16. Nxc5 Qf7: The queen tries to run away, But it's no good... keep the pressure when in attack and see the benefit
